  padding: 10px;
}

}

  transition: none;

}

  top: 0;
  line-height: 44px;
  width: 44px;
  color: white;
}

#ext_menu-0 {
  
}
#ext_menu-0 .hide-buttons .nav-btn {
  display: none !important;
}
#ext_menu-0 .navbar-caption {
  color: #ffffff;
}
#ext_menu-0 .navbar-toggler {
  color: #ffffff;
}
#ext_menu-0 .close-icon::before,
#ext_menu-0 .close-icon::after {
  background-color: #ffffff;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link,
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item {
  color: #ffffff;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
}
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .link {
  font-size: 0.921rem;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link:hover,
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item:hover,
#ext_menu-0 .link:focus,
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item:focus {
color: #d2d0cc;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link[aria-expanded="true"],
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-menu {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d); 
}
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .link:focus,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .link:hover,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .dropdown-item:focus,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .dropdown-item:hover {
background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d); 
}
#ext_menu-0 .navbar,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .link[aria-expanded="true"],
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .dropdown-menu {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d); 
}
#ext_menu-0 .bg-color.transparent .link {
  color: #ffffff;
  transition: none;
}
#ext_menu-0 .bg-color.transparent.opened .link {
  transition: color 0.2s ease-in-out;
}
#ext_menu-0 .bg-color.transparent.opened .link:hover,
#ext_menu-0 .bg-color.transparent.opened .link:focus {
color: #d2d0cc;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link[aria-expanded="true"],
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item[aria-expanded="true"] {
  color: #c0a375!important;
}
#ext_menu-0 .hide-buttons .nav-btn {
  display: none !important;
}
#ext_menu-0 .navbar-caption {
  color: #ffffff;
  font-family: 'Oswald', sans-serif;
}
#ext_menu-0 .navbar-toggler {
  color: #ffffff;
}

#ext_menu-0 .close-icon::after {
  background-color: #ffffff;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link,
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item {
  color: #ffffff;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
}
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .link {
  font-size: 0.921rem;
}

#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item:hover,
#ext_menu-0 .link:focus,
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-item:focus {
color: #d2d0cc;
}
#ext_menu-0 .link[aria-expanded="true"],
#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-menu {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d); 
}
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .link:focus,
#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .link:hover,

#ext_menu-0 .nav-dropdown-sm .dropdown-item:hover {
background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d); 
}

  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d);

  color: #ffffff;
  transition: none;

  transition: color 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

  background: initial;

  margin-left: 7px;

  color: white;
  text-align: center;
  top: 4px;
  left: 1px;

  text-align: center;
  font-size: 25px;
  direction: rtl;

  color: white;

  color: white;

  color: #ffffff;

  background-color: #ffffff;

  color: #ffffff;

  font-size: 0.85rem;
}

  font-size: 0.921rem;
}

}

#ext_menu-0 .dropdown-menu {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d); 
}

  background: linear-gradient(135deg,#d02770,#225c6d); 
}

  color: #ffffff;
  transition: none;

  transition: color 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

#ext_menu-0 .bg-color.transparent.opened .link:focus {
color: #d2d0cc;
}

  color: #c0a375!important;
}

  display: none !important;

  text-decoration: none; }

  font-size: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  padding: 0;
  width: 44px;
  height: 44px;
  line-height: 44px;
  text-align: center;

    top: 0;
    line-height: 44px;
    width: 44px; }

    color: #fff;

    margin-left: 0.1rem; }

p.lead,
.lead p {
  font-size: 1.07rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  margin-bottom: 2.3125rem; }

.article .lead p, .article .lead ul, .article .lead ol, .article .lead pre, .article .lead blockquote {
  margin-bottom: 0; }

.lead {
  font-size: 1.07rem;
  font-weight: 300; }
  .lead a {
    font-family: "Lora";
    font-style: italic;
    font-weight: 400; }
    .lead a, .lead a:hover {
    color: #d2d0cc;
      text-decoration: none; }
  .lead h1 {
    font-size: 3rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    letter-spacing: -1px;
    margin-bottom: 1.605rem; }
  .lead h2 {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    letter-spacing: -1px;
    margin-bottom: 1.605rem; }
  .lead h3 {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 1.605rem; }
  .lead h4 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 1.605rem; }
  .lead blockquote {
    font-family: "Lora";
    font-style: italic;
    padding: 10px 0 10px 20px;
    border-left: 4px solid #c39f76;
    font-size: 1.09rem;
    position: relative; }
  .lead ul, .lead ol, .lead pre, .lead blockquote {
    margin-bottom: 2.3125rem; }
  .lead pre {
    background: #f4f4f4;
    padding: 10px 0 10px 24px; }

.display-1 {
  font-size: 4.39rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: -2px;
  margin-bottom: 0.2843em;
  margin-top: 3.9rem; }

.display-2 {
  font-size: 3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: -1px;
  margin-bottom: 1.5625rem;
  margin-top: 3.5rem; }

.display-3 {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-top: 3.2rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem; }

.display-4 {
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-top: 2.3rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.8rem; }

.modal-backdrop {
  background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #564740, #3a414a);
  background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #564740, #3a414a);
  background: -o-linear-gradient(left, #564740, #3a414a);
  background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, #564740, #3a414a);
  background: linear-gradient(left, #564740, #3a414a);
  opacity: 0.94; }

  color: #232323; }

  word-break: break-word;
  word-wrap: break-word; }

  font-family: "Raleway"; }

  transition-delay: 9999s;
  transition-property: background-color, color; }

  color: #c0a375 !important; }

      width: 50%; } }

	  .nav-dropdown-sm .nav-dropdown-sm .nav-dropdown-sm .nav-dropdown-sm .social
    display: none;

      width: 100%; } }

  width: 100%;
  opacity: 1;
  -webkit-transition: .2s opacity ease-in-out;
  transition: .2s opacity ease-in-out; }

  opacity: 1; }

  background: #fff;
  display: block;
  outline: none;
  position: relative; }

    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #554346, #45505b) !important;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #554346, #45505b) !important;
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, #554346, #45505b) !important;
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, #554346, #45505b) !important;
    background: linear-gradient(left, #554346, #45505b) !important;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: .2s opacity ease-in-out;
    transition: .2s opacity ease-in-out; }

    background-color: #fff; }

  opacity: 0.9; }

  position: relative;
  margin-left: 0 !important;
  margin-right: 0 !important; }

  padding-right: 0;
  padding-top: 120px;
  padding-bottom: 120px; }

    .ics-cards-col {
      padding-top: 60px;
      padding-bottom: 60px; } }
.ics-cards .striped .card {
  padding-left: 10%;
  padding-right: 10%; }

  background: #2e2e2e;
  color: #fff; }
  .ics-cards .striped .ics-cards-col:nth-child(2n+1) .card-subtitle {
    color: #979797; }

  text-align: center;
  border: 0;
  background: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  padding-right: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0; }
  @media (max-width: 991px) {
    .ics-cards .card {
      padding-left: 0;
      padding-right: 0; } }

  .ics-cards-row {
    display: table;
    table-layout: fixed;
    width: 100%; }
    .ics-cards-row::after {
      display: none; }
  .ics-cards-col {
    display: table-cell;
    float: none; }
  .ics-cards > .container {
    margin: 0;
    max-width: none;
    padding: 0;
    width: 100%; } }

  background: none;
  padding: 0; }

  border-radius: 0;
  width: auto;
  max-width: 100%; }

  padding-top: 2.3125rem; }

  margin: 0; }
  .ics-cards .card-text + .card-btn {
    padding-top: 1.375rem; }

  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  letter-spacing: -1px;
  line-height: 1.2825; }
  .ics-cards .card-title + * {
    padding-top: 1rem; }
  .ics-cards .card-title + .card-btn {
    padding-top: 1.4375rem; }

  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-style: italic;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-family: "Lora";
  color: #5b5b5b;
  margin-top: -1rem;
  line-height: 1.7857;
  padding-bottom: 1rem; }
  .ics-cards .card-subtitle + .card-btn {
    padding-top: 0.3125rem; }
.ics-cards .iconbox {
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #f2f2f2;
  border-width: 1px;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  line-height: 100px;
  border-radius: 500px;
  display: inline-block; }
  .ics-cards .iconbox > .ics-iconfont {
    line-height: inherit; }

  padding: 0.625rem; }

    background: none;
    border-bottom: 0;
    border-top: 1px dotted rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    line-height: 3.125rem;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    padding-top: 0; }

    margin-bottom: 1.5625rem; }
  .ics-plan-title {
    font-family: "Montserrat";
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 1.28;
    margin-bottom: 0; }

    color: #a0a0a0;
    font-family: "Lora";
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-style: italic;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 1.79; }

    display: block;

    padding-left: 0;
    padding-right: 0; }

      clear: none !important;
      padding-bottom: 0 !important; } }

    display: block; }

    width: 100%; }

    text-align: center;

/*-------

   Arrow

-------*/
@-webkit-keyframes floating-arrow {
  from {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-4px);
    transform: translateY(-4px); }
  65% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(4px);
    transform: translateY(4px); }
  to {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-4px);
    transform: translateY(-4px); } }
@keyframes floating-arrow {
  from {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-4px);
    transform: translateY(-4px); }
  65% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(4px);
    transform: translateY(4px); }
  to {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-4px);
    transform: translateY(-4px); } }
.ics-arrow {
  bottom: 48px;
  left: 0;
  position: absolute;
  text-align: center;
  width: 100%; }
  @media (max-width: 991px) {
    .ics-arrow {
      bottom: 31px; } }
  @media (max-width: 320px) {
    .ics-arrow {
      bottom: 21px; } }
  @media all and (device-width: 320px) and (device-height: 568px) and (orientation: portrait) {
	  .ics-section-hero.ics-section-with-arrow .ics-section {
    padding-bottom: 0;}
	  #header1-0 .ics-section-hero .ics-section-lead {
  line-height: inherit;
}
	  .ics-section-hero .ics-section-lead {
    font-size: 1em !important;
}
	  }
  .ics-arrow a {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    border-radius: 3px;
    color: #fff;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 46px;
    outline-style: none !important;
    position: relative;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all .3s ease-in-out;
    width: 46px; }
    .ics-arrow a:hover {
      background: #2d2d2d; }
  .ics-arrow-icon {
    display: block; }
    .ics-arrow-icon::before {
      content: "\203a";
      display: inline-block;
      font-family: serif;
      font-size: 32px;
      line-height: 1;
      font-style: normal;
      left: 4px;
      position: relative;
      top: 6px;
      -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg);
      transform: rotate(90deg); }
  .ics-arrow-floating .ics-arrow-icon {
    -webkit-animation: floating-arrow 1.6s infinite ease-in-out 0s;
    animation: floating-arrow 1.6s infinite ease-in-out 0s; }

  .ics-right-padding-md-up {
    padding-right: 85px; } }

  vertical-align: top; }

  font-family: initial;
  position: absolute;
  top: -2px;
  font-weight: normal; }

  margin-left: -0.625rem;
  margin-right: -0.625rem; }
  .row-sm-offset > * {
    padding-left: 0.625rem;
    padding-right: 0.625rem; }

  from {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); }
  to {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(359deg); } }
@keyframes btnCircleLoading {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg); }
  to {
    transform: rotate(359deg); } }
.btn-loader {
  -webkit-animation: btnCircleLoading .6s infinite linear;
  animation: btnCircleLoading .6s infinite linear;
  border-radius: 50%;

  border-top-color: white;
  display: none;
  height: 26px;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -13px;
  margin-top: -13px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 26px; }

  position: relative; }
  .btn-loading .btn-text {
    visibility: hidden; }
  .btn-loading .btn-loader {
    display: block; }

.hidden {
  visibility: hidden; }

.visible {
  visibility: visible; }

  top: -0.12em;
  text-decoration: none; }

  top: -0.3em;
  position: relative;
  vertical-align: middle; }

  padding-top: 0; }

  padding-top: 0; }

  padding-top: 0; }

  padding-top: 0; }

  padding-top: 0; }

  padding-top: 2.3125rem; }

  padding-top: 1rem; }

  padding-top: 1.4375rem; }

  padding-top: 0; }

  padding-top: 0.3125rem; }

  padding-top: 1.375rem; }

.engine {
	position: absolute;
	text-indent: -2400px;
	text-align: center;
	padding: 0;
}
